name: rcon-ts
description: A modern RCON client implementation written in TypeScript (targeting ES2015) and is async/await friendly.

scripts.setup-minecraft: cd tests && rimraf .server && mkdirp .server && nugget https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/1.11.2/minecraft_server.1.11.2.jar -o .server/minecraft_server.jar && ncp fixtures/server.properties .server/server.properties && ncp fixtures/eula.txt .server/eula.txt
